storyInfo: Everyone finally returns, and Kal'tsit tells them what the Sanguinarch of Vampires has summoned—the 'Originium' of antiquity. Eblana finds Talulah, who refuses the former's solicitation. Up high in the sky, Theresa prepares for the final and decisive battle.

attributes.content: Why should I help you, Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Do you think you saved me? I didn't die, though that doesn't even matter—this shell is merely a plaything I abandoned long ago.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Besides, aren't the Sarkaz the ones hunting me down?
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: How much history have you seen?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: All that I have experienced.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Rumors say that you will divulge a piece of truth, or hint at an omen.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You tiny little creatures treat my drifting ripples as hallucinations while indulging in them, and yet you harbor resent?
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: After I was divided up by those lunatics... there's even a fallen angel carrying a part of me around, and what I've seen and heard since has actually gotten more interesting.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: On the contrary, what makes me feel absolute boredom are these so-called... bulky histories and profound topics.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Absolute boredom... you're not wrong on that.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: History always repeats itself on this land. Looking at the past is now a means of looking towards the future.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: And so, I have actually become a prophet! In this life of mine—if you can still count my current form as the same life as before—I've never thought of having such an identity.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Then... are you looking for a 'new conclusion'?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Just how old do you think I am? You little rascal.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: There won't be any new conclusions to draw, with the way all of you look like now.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Yes, something strange has happened to these decrepit bones of mine. A rabbit wears a Sarkaz's crown, and she together with a male Banshee are fighting a Vampire on top of my head.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Of course, there's that sheep playing with shadows who hangs out with you too.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Are these new to me? A little, perhaps.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: But you can't win.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: You seem so sure.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Do we also belong to the history you've seen, that has comes full circle time and time again?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: There's never been a shortage of those who resist on this great land, but they always fall into the same trap.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Besides, I understand that Vampire's tricks. He was the one who peeled off my skin back then.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Let's have a wager, Feranmut.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: This strange bunch of people—Cautus, Caprinae, Banshee, Sarkaz; they'll triumph over the Vampire that tried to hunt you.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Are you trying to win my favor? Do you think I'll look at you differently for helping me?
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: I couldn't care any less about that. But what are you putting on the table?
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: If we win, you'll lend us your help, and bring us back to where we came from.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: And if you lose?
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: We'll all be dead by that point.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You're making an empty offer, little thing.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: I accept.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: You really are easy to talk over.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: No, it's because I know that all you have are just the waves I toss up, that will calm to a still in the blink of an eye.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: So I might as well spare a little effort and raise my eyelids a little.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.text: You have indeed won, by a miniscule move. But the bet is far from over.
\nDid you really win? Did you triumph over the enmity, slaughter, and blood that Vampire represents?
Why don't we expand our wager by a little?
\nI'll bring all of you back.
\nAnd then continue to waiting for you in the cycles of history.

attributes.options: How long have they been gone?

attributes.content: Three hours and fourteen minutes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I'm really worried about them.;......;Even a Sanguinarch can bleed and die, right?

attributes.content: You should trust them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's all we can do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We're done with our combat mission too.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Our losses aren't light. Their forces here are indeed well-trained.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Most of the Sarkaz chose to fight to the end, but a small number also chose to surrender.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: You can hand them over to W's mercenary squad.;......;Will you execute them?

attributes.content: No, I'm not doing that.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It seems like you want me to make my own decision.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: That's how I wish to do so, and so does the rest.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But I refuse to let them die so simply just like that.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Perhaps it's difficult to put them on trial during wartime.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's definitely a difficult task to judge just how much blood is on the hands of every terror-stricken Sarkaz who laid down their arms.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But if we act just like they do, then we'll be no different than them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina, I'd like to take on the responsibility of investigating the crimes committed by these Sarkaz prisoners of war.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I have a professional covert intelligence background too, so I'm well versed in the ways to get them to talk.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I know what you're worried about, I...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: No, I'm not.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'll leave it to you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I won't let a single drop of blood go unaccounted for.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Prepare for battle. The Feranmut will be back soon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mon3tr, standby.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There's no way we can be sure who'll be on this return trip.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: The gigantic skeleton finally reappears.
\nThe torrents of time seem to have washed away any trace of battle, and it hovers in the air, no different than it was at any other point of time.

attributes.content: Mon3tr!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hey! Let go of me, you damn—
Ugh. Seems like that old hag's awake. Think you got her backing you up now?
That's my last grenade, so bite onto it tight, you little freak!
(Angry howling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: ...Put her down, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Shitty luck today.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: *sigh* I just wanted to give myself a ceremonial salute to announce my return—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Didn't think I'd see an old hag with a scowl on her face once the skeleton stopped.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W, don't forget we have to repair any structures you blow up here after taking over the place.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Anything destroyed will be fixed by the same hand.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Huh? What makes you think I'd even know how to fix this kinda thing?!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, Doctor.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: We've captured the Feranmut's skeleton, as well as Commander Ulšulah.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The rest of the skeleton garrison have been eliminated.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: So you're the Dame Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: I've heard so much about you.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: You're one of the Scar Market's people.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...You know every little thing that's happening in Kazdel clearly, even from somewhere as far as Victoria.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Seems like those old guys weren't lying.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: I'll have a talk with those 'old guys', as you call them, through you when we're done with business here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They are the ones who stayed behind to watch over Kazdel, and the Lich have already contacted the Military Commission that currently governs the place.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They'll be making their decision soon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: The little Cautus crashes into your arms.

attributes.options: Welcome back.;......;There's blood all over you. Are you hurt?

attributes.content: I'm fine. The blood... it was the Vampire's.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your rings... you used them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let me see your hands.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: A ring on Amiya's hand has already disintegrated, leaving not even a trace or fragment.

attributes.content: I... had to use it against him. I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...You've become more skilled with using emotions and memories.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Amiya, you fainted from releasing a ring before.
Kal'tsit, we need to run another check on Amiya.

attributes.content: No, Doctor. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm just... kind of tired.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The ring on your right index remains broken. Fortunately, that's just an effect of exerting yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You were burning from rage again.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Me.. angry?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I thought I'd be angry at the Sanguinarch of Vampires for slaughtering so many people.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But what I felt was not just that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There was also... sadness.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Sadness.
\nKal'tsit pauses briefly and a pair of pink eyes always hiding sadness within flashes through her memory.
\nA few seconds after, she comes to her senses and takes a second look at Amiya fingers.

attributes.content: These rings are meant to help you adapt to the Lord of Fiends' power, and the surge of emotions that come with it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Another ring has cracked.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Perhaps... we can do nothing but to witness these wounds open again and again.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Please don't worry, Dr. Kal'tsit. No matter who I've faced, or who I will face next...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I won't fall before they do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: the Sanguinarch of Vampires fell into someplace we don't know about.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: His court still remains, but no longer poses a threat to us.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: However, we failed to prevent the curse from being cast.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: It's coming from Londinium... what's happening over there?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Self-Salvation Corps originally believed that cutting off this supply line would be a way to end the war.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But things have changed. This 'war' will not last for much longer.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We need to hurry over. This skeleton might be able to become a new stronghold, or an unprecedented means of transport.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hopefully it can be put to good use.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The decisive battle is right before us.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Mhm. The Sarkaz cannot be the culprits of the next calamity.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Also...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit. The Vampire's obsession, his hopes, and what he called a curse, is 'Originium'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The oldest Kazdel came into contact with 'Originium' before any other civilization did.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It was not the remnants of a Catastrophe, or a mineral silently buried within rock formations. It was a hunk of 'Originium' from antiquity.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And it birthed the oldest witchcraft, and the most ancient of... Infected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If the Vampire really knew of this fact, and developed his obsession from that, thinking it could grant him power...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then it won't just be Londinium's fate that will be determined next.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Back here again.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: Londinium.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: Yeah, after all we've been through... we're finally in Victoria's capital.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: A pity it's now completely surrounded by the Sarkaz and the Dukes' armies.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Guard, quickly arrange...
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Percival, arrange another Oripathy screening for our members. I know some of them are still deteriorating.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Non-combatants will be stationed in this forest. Percival, take good care of them and keep in touch with us.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: ...Are we really going in there?
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: The Infected will be everywhere throughout the city, no matter how the war ends.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Sarkaz or Victorian, soldiers or nobles, and even farmers, workers, traders. They won't be able to judge their own identity so quickly.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Perhaps they won't even realize it until peace returns and they're once again marginalized, and then it hits them.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I was reminded of this... because of what happened to Guard.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: But, no matter.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: We have to let every Infected on this land know that our flag flies high once again.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: And more importantly, what it stands for.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Once day, when they become prisoners again, they will think of our flag as they realize the justice on this land must be won through struggle.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: What's the plan?
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: We'll split up. It won't happen overnight.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Other people can handle the task of eradicating the disease, while we'll make sure oppression will no longer be tolerated. We'll need to directly demonstrate this with our strength.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: In Victoria, we need to at the very least—
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: ——Nine.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: There's fire on the other side of the hill, a hundred or two hundred meters away at most.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It's glowing an unnatural hue.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...Percival.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: How long has it been since the scouting team last replied us?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Huh? Let me go check...
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: ...Yeah, it's been longer than our estimations. But this isn't the first time, our comms equipment are just junk after all.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: I'll go ask Red...
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.text: Talulah stares at the flames.
\nThere is no reason or omen. Only a strong feeling.
\nShe smells the stench of death cast by the firelight.

attributes.content: I didn't know Your Highness would be here in person.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: This is only a trifling swarm of Infected with weapons. Weak and pitiable people forced to unite and fight.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: ...Heh. Even if there is a surviving Draco among them?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: We'll confirm her identity and handle everything on your behalf.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: I'm not blaming you, of course.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Hmm... have the scouts located the target?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Yes. It's consistent with our intel.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: However, with all due respect—why do we have to be so concerned about her this much?
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: Even if she has the red dragon's blood—her 'identity' will only pose a slight detriment to your claim.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: But if our intel is accurate, her current identity is that of an 'Infected'.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: So what does she mean to...
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: An Infected, hm?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Don't we know another Infected Draco as well?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: My sister will soon return to my side.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Just think of it as eliminating some unnecessary variables to nourish the soil between us.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: We can—
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: A Draco.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Hehe... I've never come into contact with a Draco outside of family before.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: All of you, wait here.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: I shall take a look myself.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Ah—
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: Careful.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ......Thank you.
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: This swamp is miserable to wade through.
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Our supplies are low, and people aren't getting enough to eat. We haven't been able to get any decent medication either.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Do you need my help?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No, no thank you.
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: I walked all the way from Ursus, and this isn't so different from back then.
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.text: Talulah's footsteps slow down.
\nThe group slowly marches next to her through the shrubs and reeds.
\nThe rustling sounds are quieter than silence itself.

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Nine.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Can you release these... restraints? And your Arts too.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You should be well aware you're not allowed to use your Originium Arts. These are your yoke and fetters.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: You're 'Talulah, the Hero' only when before our Victorian compatriots.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I'm not a hero, or anything like that.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I just don't want history to repeat itself because of m—
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.text: She does not finish her sentence.
Flames of death ignite from the depths of the swamp, encircling the group in their confusion.

attributes.content: Wh-What's going on?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Where did this fire come from?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: All units on alert!
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: What is that—
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.text: An ominous deep purple climbs up Nine's body before she can finish speaking, engulfing her in death instantly.
\nCold flames of death swallow everything.

attributes.content: ...'Reunion'. Infected.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Another group of pitiable people, fighting against their pitiable fate. Tenacious, powerful, magnificent.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: And yet completely unaware they're involved in another lamentable conspiracy. Draco and Aslan, red dragon and lion.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: You people, who rose up from Ursus, were actually lead to where you stand today by a descendant of the red dragon.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Who will ultimately bring about your demise.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: 'Talulah Artorius'. What sort of woman are you, Draco?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: If you're deserving of my attention, then come forth from death.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.text: \nSparks fly as death's voice, with dead branches and reeds all reduced to ashes.
\n...But the flowers are still in bloom.
\nThey are rejecting death.

attributes.content: Flowers?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: To think there would even be... flowers that can withstand my flames?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Nine.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: These flames are special.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: She came for me, so I'll handle her.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Many of us here aren't combat-ready.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You have to keep them all safe.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Reunion will pull on your chain.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: You haven't been judged, so don't die just yet.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.text: Her flames of death are cut open.
\nNo. Her death is blocked by delicate vegetation, ignited by flames of fury.
\nFire ignites fire.
\nThe Infected turns away from her.
\nShe has never been ignored like this before.
Eblana comes to her senses at once.
\nThe gaze of the Draco named Talulah never shifted away from her.
Raging flame cleaves into mortal flame.
\nEmotion rends emotion.
\nTalulah tears into Eblana.
\nThe void is now awash with blood.
\nEblana laughs.

attributes.content: Talulah Artorius, daughter of Edward, and legitimate heir to the Victorian throne.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: This is—
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Your true self.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: We have nothing to do with each other, Draco of Dublinn.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Is that for you to say?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Just look at you, red dragon. How strong and powerful you are.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: And yet despite your might, you once again willingly toss aside the glory of the red dragon to the Aslans so easily, to let them trample on the red carpets of Westhaleg?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Victoria is a country founded by Draco, Talulah.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Why do you only resist?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: I can smell an unimaginable fury in your flames.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Do you not crave it? How can that be?!
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: ...Fury?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Do you still wish to continue playing house with the Infected? How are you this narrow-minded!
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Infected? This status does not merit mention. You can step over it, disregard it, save it.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: I give you a chance now, Talulah.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: I can disregard your Infected status, and even this pitiful mutual aid program you control.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Your flames move me, Talulah. Stand with me, and I pledge that everything you desire shall be realized into reality.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Come to my side, submit to me, and Tara shall stand together with you.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Our careers hold no conflict with each other at all. Both you and this Infected movement of yours need an end more powerful and prosperous than this.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Are you finished speaking?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Draco.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Your eyes have only desire in them.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: A desire to free Tara, exact revenge on Victoria, fulfil your own desires, or perhaps...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You have yet to even grasp what exactly lies in the depths of your desires.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Fury... It's true, and I won't deny it.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And that's why...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Come any closer, and my flames will consume you whole.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.text: Fire.
\nFury.
\nA calm fury.
\nIt burns at the extremities of her death.

attributes.content: I'm not interested in the Draco's lineage, power or the country.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Do you lead the Tarans' resistance with such a narrow-sighted desire and ideals?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If so, then perhaps it's better if I just cut you down, here and now.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Truly a pity.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Uninterested in lineage, power, nor country.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Our history summarized. An imaginary crown, an instigated resistance. Well said.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Perhaps I don't know what's going on? Or could it be... do you think I'm indulging myself with my actions?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: You shall be my most powerful vassal, though my other subjects are eager for me to kill any other living Draco to uphold my 'legitimacy'.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: But they don't know why exactly I wish to establish a nation.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: And you know it yourself?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: And my sister will do it in my stead.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Don't leave your affairs for your family to do, Draco.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You're the one ruining the lives of others with utter disregard.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Death is only my prisoner.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: No death is taken for granted, or without meaning.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: All with power will die worthy deaths.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Is that up for you to decide?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Haven't you realized yet that your manners, gentleness, affection, and even your arrogance and scorn are all fake?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You're just a hypocritical tyrant despite your bombastic words.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Death is just a scepter for you to brandish your authority, and you're not the first tyrant I've met either.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Stay away from Reunion.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What an extremely dull answer.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: But your answer will change in the end, so it'd be a pity for you to die here.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: 'Reunion'. Indeed, those flowers death could not burn earlier are equally deserving of affection.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: So, what if I tell you... Dublinn's forces will exterminate every last one of Reunion's members if you refuse to submit to me...? What will you do then?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Do you wish for us to be enemies?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: I don't know what happened in the time you spent drifting about Ursus after leaving Victoria, but I can feel it.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: From your flames—strong and weak, profound and superficial, angry and remorseful.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: She's a sinner from Reunion.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Don't think too highly of yourself, Draco.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Ah. The little flower.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Your team's not too far away. You must be so concerned for her.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: It doesn't matter, this isn't the first time Reunion is up against a strong foe.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Dublinn's forces? You already erred by not calling in your high-speed battleships immediately.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: We'll kill you before your drones arrive. I'll do my best, and everything it takes to kill you.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Your desires and ambitions—we don't care for them, and I'm in no mood to listen to your red dragon chat with Talulah.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: All I know is that you'll die.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: For sure.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Enough with that look. All of us have no wish for this to continue, right?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: —Alright, Talulah, other descendant of the red dragon.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Even if you reject me, and your actions have wholly nothing to do with my Tara...
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: But your fury, resistance, desires and answers—your end lies me with too.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Let us treat today's meeting as a first prophecy.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Tara's loyal servants shall come here one after the other.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Go, Reunion. Bring some chaos to Victoria, and create some opportunities for us.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: The next time we meet...
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: One red dragon is bound to bite the other to death.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: That's enough hiding. Come out already.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's only going to become more humid after night falls, and you won't be able to light the firewood you got.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Who... are you?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: ...You're Infected.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Doesn't matter, I'm the same. I won't harm you or anything.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: There's no need to be so wary. I'm not lying, I really am Infected.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You're... not a Victorian?
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: I'm from Yan.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What's a Yanese doing here?
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: My family came here for business and got caught up in the war. I was going to evacuate with them, but I accidentally contracted Oripathy.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: So they left me behind.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hmph. Everyone's unfair to the Infected everywhere. Your luck sure sucks.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: But we can't help you either.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: I can tell.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You don't even have a way to start a fire, so you're probably no Arts users.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't seem to be hunters either, so you won't live more than a few days.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Getting captured by the military as an Infected, or by the Sarkaz as a Victorian, either way is a terrible way to go, right?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: So?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: I can help you get a fire going at least.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Watch.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Woah! It's really burning! It was that easy?
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: Thank you so, so much, Yanese lady.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: What about you? Do you need us for anything?
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: The sky's getting dark. Can I rest here for the night?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'll leave at first light tomorrow.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: How's a foreign refugee like you this calm and unruffled?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: And your sword... even I can tell it ain't some ordinary blade.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: You're right... I'm what they call a zoubiao in Yan, like the Messengers here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm pretty skilled, and not a stranger to traversing adverse conditions either. Surviving in the wild isn't that difficult for me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You helped us start a fire... I'll leave it at that.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: *sigh*...I'll admit what we did, even if it's the soldiers who find out. As long as the Sarkaz don't catch us.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: It's not like they'll reward you with a feast.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: Is that worth discussing when we don't even have a crumb to eat right now?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: Those Reunion crazies... they're the reason why it's so dire for us now...
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: Reunion?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You haven't heard? Well, you've only been recently Infected, after all.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: They're a band of Infected, and we were all counting on them to be our saviors.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: You fought over something?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Bah.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: We robbed a Sarkaz, but they were of the opinion that we killed one of their Infected 'countrymen'.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: Sarkaz? Countrymen? My daughter's dead because of them!
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: My daughter... my girl... *sigh* Oh!
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: Do they have a leader...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: 'Nine'.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: Yeah. She's the one who chased us away.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: There was another one they called Guard, but he's dead.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: ...Grr. I really want to roast something for dinner.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: I don't know what Reunion is exactly, but the group we encountered were a bunch of hypocrites who belong in a dumpster.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: What? Heh, you want me to shake hands with the Sarkaz and make peace? I'll beat the next one I see to death.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: Right, remember the rumors we always heard? From the Ursus tundra?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: ——Talulah?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: 'Hero of the Infected'? She didn't seem much at all to me.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: I remember she was always trailing behind Nine, and never said anything more than a few words.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: The hearsay from those old Infected weren't worth shite. Nine might have been the actual decision maker all along.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: ...*sigh*. This is all just useless banter. It's too late for you to join them, Yanese fella.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: Where did they go?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And how would I know?
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: Back then I left in a huff with this guy in tow. I remember there being a Messenger station in this direction about a dozen kilometers from here.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: An early rest for us today then.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We have to get back on the road tomorrow.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Nothing unusual to report.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: Did you hear? The dukes seemed to have bumped into each other.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: Duke Windermere sacrificed herself, and the other lords can no longer sit still either.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier B

attributes.content: *sigh* The madam's legendary tale is still in my mobile terminal...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier B

attributes.content: Legends are useless now.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: But... do you know who was keeping watch here at Chetleigh before we took command? I thought the Sarkaz seized this place long ago.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: Could they have been stragglers from some army? Maybe it's the Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps. Rumors abound that they're still active.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier B

attributes.content: That's ace. They managed to stand up to the Sarkaz even though there's no decent equipment to be found here.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: Yeah. They're definitely veterans roaming about the country who can take on a hundred alone.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier B

attributes.content: Right? No way they're just some local thugs or worker riffraff.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: The scouts sent their intel.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: Basically it was pretty much what the commander predicted... which was 'impossible to predict'.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: Meh. Send it to the tent, I can't make heads or tails of it either. The Sarkaz army's methods are just too unconventional.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier B

attributes.content: ...Wait.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: The scouts say they detected a strange squad identification code.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: Want to report it together?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier B

attributes.content: 'The Exemplars'?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: Isn't that name from the War of the Four Nations...?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: What am I supposed to tell them? Our scouts saw a specter?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier A

attributes.content: ...'The Exemplars'.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Know anythin' about them?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No... I'm from the Duke of Fife's 4th infantry battalion...um. That's no longer important.
attributes.name: Injured Soldier

attributes.content: Aye, you're just an Infected now, and I'm basically a deserter...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Haha, we're both in a wee bit of a pickle, aren't we? Didn't think I'd have to be so overcautious here in Chetleigh.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Bagpipe... I can't find this funny at all.
attributes.name: Injured Soldier

attributes.content: Chetleigh's now under the army's jurisdiction, so are we...
attributes.name: Injured Soldier

attributes.content: ...Sigh.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'm sure you have no clue how enchantin' the hay piles are this time of year. I want to celebrate with me army chums back home too.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But I can't expose myself so easily like that. They treat deserters no better than fowlbeasts on the chopping block for dinner.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're a good one, miss. I'm sure you can sort this misunderstanding out...
attributes.name: Injured Soldier

attributes.content: Tell me that a year back and I might have believed ye.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: 'The Exemplars'...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: ...Ain't that the Tempest Platoon's former name?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Still following me?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Uhm.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: You seem strong... and we haven' eaten at all the past two days...
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: We're all fellow Infected, aren't we?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: We'll travel together for a while more.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You might be able to see the station you mentioned after this hillside.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Or maybe it's been smashed to bits... wait.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: Look, over there. People, right?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Stay calm. Their numbers are limited, at the very least.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wait, hold on! They're Victorians! I can see them!
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: Are they a squad of refugees? I can see some soldier guards too!
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: What do we do?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: This is much better than running into Sarkaz, but we're Infected... are we going to be...
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: The Infected already abandoned us, so we might as well ask them for food than starve to death out here.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: B-besides, think about it. How many people are going to emerge from this war with Oripathy? Surely they'll let us live somehow?
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: Of course. Definitely. For sure, I'm sure they will.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: I'll go take a look.
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: Heavens! What's going to happen if the soldiers do turn hostile?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: And, um, you're a Yanese... what if...
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: ...I think you can ease up on the anxiety.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Look. They seem to be getting along well.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.content: I-it really does look like it. He's waving, I'll go over.
attributes.name: Indifferent Infected

attributes.text: Ch'en watches the two Infected mingle with their compatriots.
\nVigilance, talking, casual chatting.
\nSoon someone puts their arm on their shoulders, and their cheery chatter reaches Ch'en's ears.
\nCh'en stays at her spot for a long time.

attributes.content: Yanese lady!
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: I talked with them, we can travel together—
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: Huh. Where'd she go?
attributes.name: Angry Infected

attributes.content: 'You beat a Sarkaz to death? Hell yeah, you're our heroes!'
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You finally replied to my invitation, Duke Gododdin.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: It seems that even you realize now how serious the situation is.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Yes, it's gotten so serious that our cautious Duke Caster has actually left her territory to grace the front lines in person.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: A Victorian Duke has died on the battlefield... how many years has it been since something like this has happened?
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Quite a few of our fellow nobles suspect you behind your back, you know. After all, everyone knows you never got along with the Duke of Windermere.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: That stubborn Windermere would never support your little plot to take over Londinium.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: But I know it wouldn't be you.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: You welcome any loss she suffers, even if they were major. But now... your problems have only increased with her death.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: In fact, all of us here have attracted a big problem.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: There are rumors from outside that the young Duke Gododdin today is obsessed with notions of romance and lacks the wisdom and wits of his house.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: It seems that our country has become so weak that we've exhausted our ability to understand people.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Don't flatter me, I'm only disinclined to care about other matters, yours included.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Alas. Why does this war compel us to face our responsibilities? All I can do is to walk out the winery and throw myself down at the table of today.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: And for this end I've even brought a friend.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: It was not easy to bring him off his high-speed battleship.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: To think the Duke of Wellington would grace us with his presence.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: My time grows short.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: I hear you met with some troubles on the frontline. The Nachzehrer King is not an easy enemy to deal with.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: ...Hmph.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: No more than just a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: You must take care of yourself. After all, you're already...
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: I'm not at the age where I need you to tell me how old I am.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: The stalemate on the frontline will soon end, and Windermere's defeat will have a... minimal impact on the war situation.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: We will be able to retake the frontlines in no time.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: Your valiant march onwards has caused the ducal armies to clash with the Sarkaz military on all fronts.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: It's not enough.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: We must execute an effective offensive than continue defending our fragmented defenses to win this war.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: Our counterattack must begin.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: ...I agree.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: A rare sight to see the two of you in agreement.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Londinium is now officially declared to be under the Sarkaz's occupation. This means they no longer have a need to hide.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: This does not bode well for us at all.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: My follow-up units will assemble in three days.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: We suffered some losses in the previous war, but Wellington's battleships will still be the first to rush into the storm.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: I will participate as well. And see to it that the Dukes of Normandy and Fife join our efforts.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Abercorn and Ashworth will of course, also be reasonable people—
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: What an unprecedented sight to behold. The dukes speeding to Londinium on their battleships to shell the city walls.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Hmph, I hope there won't be a second time.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: Inform your troops that I will take command in this battle.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: Naturally.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Well then, if you will excuse me. There are many matters waiting for me to handle on the front line.
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: And just like that. Truly a swift and decisive man.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: I grew up listening to the tales of 'The Empire's Death Knell', but I didn't think his hair would actually turn completely white.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: *sigh* Forming a military alliance with other dukes used to be an earth-shaking affair, but look at us now; we can't even have a presentable meeting.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Judging from his words, he's become a stubborn old man unwilling to admit his setbacks.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Duke Caster, I know nothing about war, but looking at old Wellington's condition, I fear we won't be able to completely trust him...
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Caster?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Indeed... trust.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: No, it's nothing. I merely recalled some past events from my youth.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Old Wellington... he conceals his impatience, his unease, and even his shortcomings. He is getting older as well.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: But he can't fool me. It's all fake.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: You've known him for a long time.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: For far too many years... even from when I was just a little girl with no experience.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: What are your thoughts on the matter?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: The look in his eyes as he spoke of the Nachzehrer was exactly the same as it used to be in his youth.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Be it friend or foe, he is like a beast thirsting to tear the other to feast on their blood.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: To rip out their entrails, chew their bones, and swallow them.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Hunt, devour, grow. He has always been this sort of warrior.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: The old man's appetite has always been good.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Who was already in Duke Wellington's belly, when you met him?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Ivan Yevgenyevich.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Herkunftshorn.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: As well as Corsica I.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: You were really... quite young back then.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: There used to be a saying in the among the nobles in Caster territory, regarded as an ominous symbol.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: 'Victoria only has one true Duke after the War of the Four Nations.'
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: For we restricted and weakened him after that fort more than sixty years. The people forget about heroes in peacetime, and the nobles repel the death knell in their fear.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: He revealed his fatigue earlier.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: But I think of, and I've always been thinking of something—the smile on his face when we were both young, flashed towards the endless expanse of the battlefront...
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: He stood side by side with the Emperor of Ursus, he witnessed the Witch King's arts, he saw the greatest of monarchs and dismantled the largest modern cities to exist then.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: How can someone like him willingly throw himself to the slaughter?
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: So you're telling me, our man who has had no choice but to swallow his pride for decades and might be still Victoria's strongest general, has divulged his true feelings?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Heheh, you're the one who invited him to the table. You know he has a trump card up his sleeve.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: I'm feeling a little chilly. The wind outside tonight is rather strong.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Chilly? Be sure not to catch a cold, Duke Gododdin.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Ahaha, of course not. Please be at ease.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Despite what everyone says about me, I really am lazy and would much rather stay in my lovely estate appreciating the countryside view than to be on a battleship.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: But I do like winter.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Ah! I got it!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You tinkering with the radio equipment again?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Didn't I already tell you multiple times, Closure?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Our recent patrols haven't gone far enough to pick up any signals coming from inside Londinium.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: And I already told you so many times, I'm a Rhodes Island engineer!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Look, my equipment specially made for Rhodes Island communications can now receive signals from other channels after my many modifications!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Let's see—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.text: 'Londinium Self-Salvation Corps broadcast, *Electric current noise*. Repeat, Commander Clovisia and the other members who have not left are still fighting. Repeat, we need back up——'

attributes.content: Commander Clovisia! I knew she and the others were fine!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: We need to hurry and tell everyone about this.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Great, they're all right and I'm done debugging this tool in my hand.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Wait, there's another message from the Rhodes Island channel.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It can't be... what happened to Blaze and the rest with her, and what's with all the regular Infected...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.text: '*Electric current noise* The disembarkment application for Londinium, Victoria has been approved *Electric current noise* Local branch operators, please make preparations.'
\n'Repeat, please make preparations.'

attributes.content: So many books here, but not even a vegetable stem to be found.
attributes.name: Beleaguered Mercenary

attributes.content: The number of books won't matter if we don't find any stems.
attributes.name: Starving Mercenary

attributes.content: Are you sure we can find something edible here?
attributes.name: Starving Mercenary

attributes.content: If we don't, then we can just kick down some house door after.
attributes.name: Beleaguered Mercenary

attributes.content: Won't they put up a fight?
attributes.name: Starving Mercenary

attributes.content: We already took them all away.
attributes.name: Beleaguered Mercenary

attributes.content: (yawn) Man, I'm beat.
attributes.name: Beleaguered Mercenary

attributes.content: Life was so much simpler before.
attributes.name: Beleaguered Mercenary

attributes.content: Swing our sword, cut someone down, swing again, cut down another, and then boom. Money.
attributes.name: Beleaguered Mercenary

attributes.content: But now? We can't even find a single stem to eat.
attributes.name: Beleaguered Mercenary

attributes.content: Is Londinium still considered Victoria's now?
attributes.name: Starving Mercenary

attributes.content: I mean, we occupied it, so does it count as a new city of ours now? Or is it still Victoria's?
attributes.name: Starving Mercenary

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Beleaguered Mercenary

attributes.content: All I know is the clouds have been gathering lately. The top of that building... is extremely unusual.
attributes.name: Beleaguered Mercenary

attributes.content: What's there to worry? That's where the regent is.
attributes.name: Starving Mercenary

attributes.content: Do you hear a... strange noise?
attributes.name: Starving Mercenary

attributes.content: Huh? Nah.
attributes.name: Beleaguered Mercenary

attributes.content: That's so strange...
attributes.name: Starving Mercenary

attributes.text: A huge figure emerges from the shadows, and a ray of light blazes through the deathly still streets.
\nIt raises it's heavy right arm, and then harshly drops it.
The armor falls into silence, like it was just an illusion. A faint fire seeping from its helmet is the only sign that it still lives.
She stretches out her hand to touch the knight, but is forced to refrain from the residual heat on the armor.
\nThe armor remains silent.

attributes.content: Your Highness, what are you looking at?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Dark clouds.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The Shard's energy is gathered. According to the Confessarii research, a device like this able to manipulate Originium's reactions will also be able to control that piece of 'Originium'.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The dukes have begun mobilizing their forces, and in a few days...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: No, I don't mean the clouds here.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: What's about to happen in Londinium is set in stone.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Manfred, you were born in Kazdel. What does it look like in your memories?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: It was already the hub unit of your nomadic city while I was growing up.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: My memories of the place... the sky was always overcast. Even worse than Victoria's skies, to be honest. There was always a pungent stench of industrial waste in the air.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Would you can that place... 'home'?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I would.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Really.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I was thinking how we Sarkaz always travel within a haze.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: We are determined to tear the clouds apart...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But, when everything is finally revealed—
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The true calamity will follow.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Will we make it in time?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I hope the light I've been looking at can still shine then.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Even if I'm already in the depths of the darkness.
attributes.name: Theresa
